member.name: M:Open.Database.Extensions.ExpressiveCommandBase`4.AsSourceBlock``1(System.Func{System.Data.IDataRecord,``0},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a buffer block that will contain the results.
member.typeparam: The expected type.
member.param: The transform function.

By default the command is deferred. If set to true, the command runs synchronusly and all data is acquired before the method returns. If set to false (default) the data is recieved asynchronously (deferred: data will be subsequently posted) and the source block (transform) can be completed early.
member.returns: The buffer block that will contain the results.

member.name: M:Open.Database.Extensions.ExpressiveCommandBase`4.AsSourceBlock``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.ValueTuple{System.String,System.String}},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Provides a transform block as the source of records.
member.typeparam: The model type to map the values to (using reflection).
member.param: An override map of field names to column names where the keys are the property names, and values are the column names.

By default the command is deferred. If set to true, the command runs synchronusly and all data is acquired before the method returns. If set to false (default) the data is recieved asynchronously (data will be subsequently posted) and the source block (transform) can be completed early.
member.returns: A transform block that is recieving the results.

member.name: M:Open.Database.Extensions.ExpressiveCommandBase`4.AsSourceBlock``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Provides a transform block as the source of records.
member.typeparam: The model type to map the values to (using reflection).
member.param: An override map of field names to column names where the keys are the property names, and values are the column names.

By default the command is deferred. If set to true, the command runs synchronusly and all data is acquired before the method returns. If set to false (default) the data is recieved asynchronously (data will be subsequently posted) and the source block (transform) can be completed early.
member.returns: A transform block that is recieving the results.
